instruction: Wash idli rice 2–3 times and soak for 4–5 hours.
Wash urad dal + fenugreek seeds and soak for 4 hours.
Grind soaked urad dal with little water until fluffy.
Grind soaked rice to slightly coarse paste.
Mix both pastes with salt until combined.
Grease idli plates lightly with oil.
Add toor dal, 2 cups water, turmeric to pressure cooker.
Boil onion, tomato, carrot, drumstick, chilli.
Add sambar powder, tamarind water, jaggery.
Heat oil; add mustard seeds to crackle.
Add cumin, curry leaves, red chilli, hing.
Stir fry vegetables on high flame
Add rice, soy sauce, mix well
